review:
One of the best movie ever made by Mohit Suri, and villain's role is the backbone of this movie. Emraan Hashmi is one of the best actor in Bollywood and I don't know why he is so underrated. BGM of the movie was spine chilling and terrific. Screenplay of the movie was also good and kept audience engaged throughout the movie.
Rating:8/10.
